statements: SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donor_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donor_category = 'major'
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date, donor_category FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 1;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_category = 'major' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_category FROM donors WHERE donor_category IN ('major', 'recurring') ORDER BY donor_id ASC, donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donor_id = 5;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount >= 1000;
SELECT donor_name FROM recurring_donors WHERE donor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recurring_donors;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM major_donors ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT donor_name FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY donor_name;
SELECT donor_name, donation_frequency FROM recurring_donors WHERE donation_frequency = 'Monthly' ORDER BY donor_name, donor_id DESC;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors JOIN recurring_donors ON major_donors.donor_id = recurring_donors.donor_id ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM major_donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM recurring_donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS average_donation_amount FROM major_donors;
SELECT * FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_frequency FROM recurring_donors WHERE donation_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND donation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM major_donors WHERE donation_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT donor_id, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM recurring_donors GROUP BY donor_id ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT * FROM major_donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM recurring_donors WHERE donation_frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT AVG(donation_amount) AS avg_donation FROM major_donors;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_category FROM donor_categories WHERE donor_category = 'Gold';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_frequency FROM major_donors INNER JOIN recurring_donors ON major_donors.donor_id = recurring_donors.donor_id;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY donation_date;
SELECT donor_name, donor_category FROM donor_categories LEFT JOIN major_donors ON donor_categories.donor_id = major_donors.donor_id WHERE major_donors.donation_amount IS NULL;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM major_donors LEFT JOIN first_time_donors ON major_donors.donor_id = first_time_donors.donor_id WHERE donation_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM major_donors ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM recurring_donors ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category, COUNT(donor_id) AS total_donors FROM donor_categories GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, name, donation_amount FROM major_donors WHERE donation_amount > 5000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, donation_frequency FROM recurring_donors WHERE donation_frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT id, name, donation_date FROM first_time_donors WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT dh.donor_id, dh.donation_date, dh.amount, md.name FROM donation_history dh INNER JOIN major_donors md ON dh.donor_id = md.id WHERE dh.amount >= 1000 AND md.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY dh.donation_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT dc.donor_id, md.name, dc.category FROM donor_categories dc INNER JOIN major_donors md ON dc.donor_id = md.id WHERE dc.category IN ('VIP', 'Gold') ORDER BY dc.donor_id ASC LIMIT 5;
